amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to decrease Ur M. Jaddou, Director, U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services salary to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
